content: And he said to his disciples,
The apostles said to the Lord, “Increase our faith!”
On the way to Jerusalem he was passing along between Samaria and Galilee.
And as he entered a village, he was met by ten lepers, who stood at a distance
and lifted up their voices, saying, “Jesus, Master, have mercy on us.”
When he saw them he said to them,  And as they went they were cleansed.
Then one of them, when he saw that he was healed, turned back, praising God with a loud voice;
and he fell on his face at Jesus' feet, giving him thanks. Now he was a Samaritan.
Being asked by the Pharisees when the kingdom of God would come, he answered them,
And he said to the disciples,
And they said to him, “Where, Lord?” He said to them,
